attributes.title: Trump is a bad man so is this app

attributes.review:
When i initially downloaded this app, i was hoping to get in contact with Mr.Trump.
I soon found out that it did nothing of what i hoped it would. Burgers with feet summoned in my closet and started crawling towards me. I tried to close my mouth. But the first patty spread my mouth open, as the second one fed itself to me. I wasnâ€™t hungry as i had already ate chef boyarde meatsauce. Full belly, mouth full. The burgers grease started sliding its way down my throat and its feet smelt like boiled turkey elbows. The grease brothel both break danced and dazzled my throat. I tried to stop it, but it was too late. 

After digestion was successfully completed, i cried all night. The pieces of chunk that burger fed to me will forever haunt me. I hope i get the justice i deserve. And the cops find a way to get it out of my system so it doesnâ€™t harm me anymore. I feel it kicking at my chest and doing toe scrunches as Iâ€™m typing this message. Please help me #BANTRUMP
